data.name: icsappointment_delete.twig
data.value:
{% block content %}
BEGIN:VCALENDAR
X-LOTUS-CHARSET:UTF-8
CALSCALE:GREGORIAN
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:ZMS-München
METHOD:REQUEST
X-WR-TIMEZONE:Europe/Berlin
BEGIN:VTIMEZONE
TZID:Europe/Berlin
X-LIC-LOCATION:Europe/Berlin
BEGIN:DAYLIGHT
TZOFFSETFROM:+0100
TZOFFSETTO:+0200
TZNAME:CEST
DTSTART:19700329T020000
RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=3
END:DAYLIGHT
BEGIN:STANDARD
TZOFFSETFROM:+0200
TZOFFSETTO:+0100
TZNAME:CET
DTSTART:19701025T030000
RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=10
END:STANDARD
END:VTIMEZONE
BEGIN:VEVENT
UID:{{ startTime|date("Ymd") }}-{{ process.displayNumber }}
ORGANIZER;CN="{{ process.scope.provider.displayName }}":MAILTO:{{ process.scope.preferences.client.emailFrom }}
SEQUENCE:0
LOCATION:{{ process.scope.provider.displayName }} {{ process.scope.provider.contact.street }} {{ process.scope.provider.contact.streetNumber }}\, {{ process.scope.provider.contact.postalCode }} {{ process.scope.provider.contact.city }}
GEO:48.85299;2.36885
SUMMARY:{{ "Terminabsage:"|trans }} {{ process.displayNumber }}
DESCRIPTION:{{ message }}
CLASS:PUBLIC
DTSTART;TZID=Europe/Berlin:{{ startTime|date("Ymd") }}T{{ startTime|date("His") }}
DTEND;TZID=Europe/Berlin:{{ endTime|date("Ymd") }}T{{ endTime|date("His") }}
DTSTAMP:{{ timestamp|date("Ymd") }}T{{ timestamp|date("His") }}
STATUS:CANCELLED
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR
{% endblock %}

data.name: icsappointment.twig
data.value:
{% block content %}
BEGIN:VCALENDAR
X-LOTUS-CHARSET:UTF-8
CALSCALE:GREGORIAN
VERSION:2.0
PRODID:ZMS-München
METHOD:REQUEST
X-WR-TIMEZONE:Europe/Berlin
BEGIN:VTIMEZONE
TZID:Europe/Berlin
X-LIC-LOCATION:Europe/Berlin
BEGIN:DAYLIGHT
TZOFFSETFROM:+0100
TZOFFSETTO:+0200
TZNAME:CEST
DTSTART:19700329T020000
RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=3
END:DAYLIGHT
BEGIN:STANDARD
TZOFFSETFROM:+0200
TZOFFSETTO:+0100
TZNAME:CET
DTSTART:19701025T030000
RRULE:FREQ=YEARLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=-1SU;BYMONTH=10
END:STANDARD
END:VTIMEZONE
BEGIN:VEVENT
UID:{{ startTime|date("Ymd") }}-{{ process.displayNumber }}
ORGANIZER;CN="Landeshauptstadt München":MAILTO:{{ process.scope.preferences.client.emailFrom }}
SEQUENCE:0
LOCATION:Landeshauptstadt München - {{ process.scope.provider.displayName }}, {{ process.scope.provider.contact.street }} {{ process.scope.provider.contact.streetNumber }}
GEO:48.85299;2.36885
SUMMARY: {{ process.requests|reduce((carry, req) => carry|merge({ (req.name): (carry[req.name] is defined ? carry[req.name] + 1 : 1) }), {})|map((count, name) => (count > 1 ? count ~ 'x' : '') ~ name)|join(', ') }}
DESCRIPTION:Terminnummer: {{ process.displayNumber }}\n\nLeistung:\n{% for requestGroup in requestGroups %}{{ requestGroup['count'] }}x {{ requestGroup['request'].name }}: https://stadt.muenchen.de/service/info/{{ requestGroup['request'].id }}{% if not loop.last %}\n{% endif %}{% endfor %}\n\nIhnen ist etwas dazwischen gekomme? Sagen Sie Ihren Termin ab oder verschieben Sie Ihren Termin:\n{{ config.appointments.urlAppointments }}#/appointment/{{ appointmentLink }}\n
CLASS:PUBLIC
DTSTART;TZID=Europe/Berlin:{{ startTime|date("Ymd") }}T{{ startTime|date("His") }}
DTEND;TZID=Europe/Berlin:{{ endTime|date("Ymd") }}T{{ endTime|date("His") }}
DTSTAMP:{{ timestamp|date("Ymd") }}T{{ timestamp|date("His") }}
BEGIN:VALARM
ACTION:DISPLAY
DESCRIPTION:{{ "München-Termin123:"|trans }} {{ process.displayNumber }}
TRIGGER:-P1D
END:VALARM
STATUS:CONFIRMED
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR
{% endblock %}
